result.title: WWDC25: Optimize your custom environments for visionOS | Apple

video_info.title: WWDC25: Optimize your custom environments for visionOS | Apple
video_info.description:
Discover how you can use procedural tools to create beautiful immersive environments for your visionOS app or game. We’ll share the building blocks for creating a high-quality environment, then dive deep into the optimization process. Learn how to use a series of Apple-provided workflows for Houdini to reduce your scene’s polygon count, clean up geometry, package UV maps, and create USD assets to import into Reality Composer Pro or your game engine of choice.

Explore related documentation, sample code, and more:
Download immersive environment optimization toolkit for Houdini: https://developer.apple.com/download/files/Immersive-Optimization-Toolkit.zip
Construct an immersive environment for visionOS: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/RealityKit/construct-an-immersive-environment-for-visionOS
Enabling video reflections in an immersive environment: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/visionOS/enabling-video-reflections-in-an-immersive-environment
Optimize your 3D assets for spatial computing: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2024/10186
Create custom environments for your immersive apps in visionOS: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2024/10087
Enhance the immersion of media viewing in custom environments: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2024/10115
Explore the USD ecosystem: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2023/10086

00:00 - Introduction
03:51 - Prepare for Vision Pro
07:35 - Optimize geometry
08:12 - Optimize geometry: Adaptive reduction
12:26 - Optimize geometry: Geometry billboards
14:43 - Optimize geometry: Occlusion culling
17:22 - UV projection
24:20 - Baking textures
25:38 - USD setup
28:35 - Wrap-up
